# Overview of set_knit_hooks

The **set_knit_hooks** function is a convenient utility for creating custom knitr hooks in R Markdown documents. This can be used to override existing hooks in order to customize how your code chunks are processed, allowing for improved document formatting. 

## What package does it come from?

The **set_knit_hooks** function is part of the **knitr** package and is available when the package is loaded into the R session.
